subject: feat: implement schema alignment and multiple file loading
body:
Schema Alignment:
- Add author_id field to commits (references metadata.authors)
- Replace parseMethod with is_conventional boolean
- Add authors map to metadata.json for author lookup
- Add security_events array to summary.json
- Wrap commits.json in { "commits": [...] } object
- Update aggregate.js to match new schema

Dashboard - Multiple Data Files:
- File picker accepts multiple files (HTML5 multiple attribute)
- Client-side combineDataFiles() function merges data
- Combines commits, contributors, files from multiple repos
- Merges authors from metadata of all files
- Shows repo filter when multiple repos loaded

Updated documentation:
- USER_GUIDE.md: Added Loading Data section with multi-file instructions
- TODO.md: Marked medium priority items as complete
- SESSION_NOTES.md: Updated current state
- HISTORY.md: Added schema alignment and multi-file entries
